title: Belgian Waffle Ride Announces 2024 Schedule with Second Mexico Race and New Tripel Crown of Gravel Series Format
content:
The BWR omnium series is now comprised of three mandatory events, versus the old format of two mandatory events and two of a rider’s choice. 

Read the full article at Belgian Waffle Ride Announces 2024 Schedule with Second Mexico Race and New Tripel Crown of Gravel Series Format on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
